snippet: A possibly potent kind of super PAC is proliferating in the closing weeks of the campaign, transforming Congressional races with a barrage of outside money.
abstract: Possibly potent kind of super PAC is proliferating in the closing weeks of the election cycle, taking aim at House races with a barrage of outside money; these smaller groups often pursue narrower agendas, or are linked to specific candidates, and often fly under the radar, rarely announcing themselves to the world beyond their ads.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and JO CRAVEN McGINTY

lead_paragraph: A possibly potent kind of super PAC is proliferating in the closing weeks of the campaign, transforming Congressional races with a barrage of outside money.

headline.main: New ‘Super PACs’ Alter Landscape for House Races
headline.print_headline: New ‘Super Pacs’ Alter Landscape For House Races
